articles.author: HexShift
articles.description:
In volatile markets, every second counts. Your users donâ€™t want to refreshâ€”they want live prices, moving charts, and streaming data.
Phoenixâ€¯LiveView makes this not just possibleâ€”but elegant.
No SPA. No JS frameworks. Just Elixir, sockets, and structured state.
Most financial APIs (Binance, Coinbase, Polygon.io) expose WebSocket feeds.
Use websockex to consume them:
WebSockex.start_link(
  "wss://stream.binance.com:9443/ws/btcusdt@trade",
  __MODULE__,
  %{}
)

Each message is a trade or price event. Forward it to your app via:
Phoenix.PubSub.broadcast(MyApp.PubSub, "btc:usd", {:price_update, payload})

Then in your LiveView:
def mount(_, _, socket) do
  Phoenix.PubSub.subscribe(MyApp.PubSub, "btc:usd")
  {:ok, assign(socket, latest_price: nil)}
end

def handle_info({:price_update, data}, â€¦
articles.title: How to Build a Live Financial Dashboard with Phoenix LiveView and Streaming APIs

We Need to see the advantage of an OS & The same the disadvantage too,So Lets see the Disadvantage of linux

You can't use full versions of software like Photoshop, MS Office, or Premiere Pro directly. Youâ€™ll need alternatives or tricks like Wine.
-> Not the Best for Gaming
Many popular games donâ€™t support Linux well. Online multiplayer games may not work due to anti-cheat software issues.
-> Hard to Learn at First
If you're new, using the terminal and installing things without a simple installer might feel confusing.
Conclusion :
So finally, what I understood is â€”
Linux is not just an operating system... it's a whole universe. 
But Linux? It's a community, a craft, and a culture.
Iâ€™m not an expert. Iâ€™m just someone who stepped into the forest and decided to walk...!

articles.author: Rajat
articles.description:
From Choppy to Smooth: Your Guide to Native-Like Animation in JavaScript
When it comes to building modern, fluid interfaces, the difference between a good animation and a great one lies in timing. That's where requestAnimationFrame comes in. This powerful JavaScript method synchronizes animations with the browser's rendering cycle, offering smoother motion and better performance than traditional interval-based approaches. In this article, we'll break down how requestAnimationFrame works, explore best practices, and show how it can transform your animations from jittery to seamless with just a few lines of code.
Have you ever wondered how to create smooth, high-performance animations on your web pages without overloading your browser? In this article, we'll explore the powerful JavaScript fâ€¦
articles.title: Mastering requestAnimationFrame: Create Smooth, High-Performance Animations in JavaScript

articles.author: Arber
articles.description:
When learning the idea behind MCP Servers, I kept running into the same wall: tools that demo well but take hours to adapt and most focus on integrating with Claude Desktop directly, and not into a web stack... in local or deployed environments.
So I built MCP Hub â€” not to compete with whatâ€™s out there, but to fill the gap I couldnâ€™t find a fix for.
Disclaimer: This post was written and formatted by my custom GPT, doing it's best to sound just like me!
There are many impressive repos out there that make great use of MCP Servers, but watching others on YouTube implement them, I quickly realized that what I needed was a framework I could understand and so I built it utilizing the official SDK.
MCP Hub is a minimal but complete(?) setup that you can run as-is or drop directly into any Node seâ€¦
articles.title: MCP Hub: A Plug-and-Play Server of Servers for Your App

articles.author: Degn Munck
articles.description:
virtual registered agent service 
Developing a Minimal Liability Business (LLC) in Tennessee is an appealing option for business owners aiming to profit from the state's business-friendly atmosphere. An important action in this procedure is selecting a signed up representative for the LLC. A signed up representative serves as the official factor of get in touch with for getting lawful records, tax notices, and federal government communication on part of the company. This duty is not only mandatory but critical in making certain that business preserves good standing with the state authorities. The registered representative has to be offered throughout typical company hours and need to have a physical address in Tennessee, called a licensed office, where they can obtain main interactions. 
Tâ€¦
articles.title: Understanding LLC Development and Registered Representative Needs in Tennessee

articles.author: Ashu Sharma
articles.description:
So this time I was given the below problem:
Given an array 'nums' with n objects colored red, white, or blue, sort them in-place so that objects of the same color are adjacent, with the colors in the order red, white, and blue.
We will use the integers 0, 1, and 2 to represent the color red, white, and blue, respectively.
You must solve this problem without using the library's sort function.
Example
Input: nums = [2,0,2,1,1,0]
Output: [0,0,1,1,2,2]

My brain immediately went:

I had a gut feeling this was about rearranging and grouping elements. My intuition screamed "pointers!" Not just two, but three. Also I get to know  that this classic problem is often called the Dutch National Flag problem.
The Game Plan: Three Pointers for Three Colors
To do this in a single pass, we'll use three poâ€¦
articles.title: Dutch National Flag Problem
